title: ðŸš¨Cowboys hire Mike McCarthy as head coach - Emergency Podcast (Football 1/6)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports NFL writers Patrik Walker and Jared Dubin to react to the Cowboys hiring of Mike McCarthy as their next head. The guys discuss the timing of the move and the flaws with the coaching search as they hire comes just a day after officially letting go of previous head coach Jason Garrett. Will, Patrik and Jared also analyze how McCarthy has possibly changed since we last saw him on the sidelines, what a potential coaching staff around him could look like plus how the Cowboys will address the rest of the offseason and what type of power McCarthy will have within the organization compared to the Jones family.
